summary: Successfully tested SalesGenius Team Management and Admin Settings features. All backend APIs (27/27) and frontend navigation working correctly. New embeddable widget.js script accessible.
passed_tests: Team Management page loads with role legend and owner member
Invite team member dialog opens and accepts form data
Team member invitation flow works (email and role selection)
Admin Settings page loads with 3 tabs (General, Notifications, AI & API)
General tab shows company info form with timezone/language selectors
Notifications tab displays toggleable switches for lead/conversation alerts
AI & API tab shows model selection dropdown and token configuration
All Admin Settings tabs are accessible and responsive
Backend API /api/team/members returns team members list with owner
Backend API /api/team/invite creates team member invitations
Backend API /api/admin/api-config returns AI model information
All existing functionality still working (auth, knowledge, widget, analytics)

success_percentage.backend: 100% (27/27 API tests passed including new team/admin endpoints)
